name: Overhand Cable Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and kneel beside a cable machine, grasping the handle.
2. With an overhand grip, keep your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart on the bar.
3. Keeping your upper arms still, use only your forearms to curl the weight towards your shoulders.
4. Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement and then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Overhand cable curls isolate the upper arm using a low-impact, adjustable machine.
